name: KUROZU (MoonShot Group)
description:
The world buckled beneath his feet. He was sent to an another dimension: a twisted vision of their own future. Ancient forces threaten to corrupt the Earth. The only one who can stave off this disaster is him. Enter a world of brutality.

Enter The Black Whirlpool.

===========================================================

KUROZU is a throwback FPS developed by students of UW-Whitewater from 2017-2018. This demo is the version that was shown at the Media Arts & Game Development Expo in 2018. 

KUROZU is compatible with mouse and keyboard controls as well as X-Box One controllers and supports up to 4 players in multiplayer deathmatch. Bots are also available.
